key_risks: Exposure to volatile commodity markets and global economic uncertainties
Regulatory scrutiny and compliance risks in multiple jurisdictions
Reputational risks due to environmental and governance controversies
controversies: Criticism for financing fossil fuel projects despite net-zero commitments
Exploitation of loopholes in Net-Zero Banking Alliance (NZBA) guidelines
Past instances of poor compliance practices and governance issues
environmental_issues: Continued involvement in fossil fuel projects conflicting with green energy initiatives
Lack of targets for off-balance sheet fossil fuel exposures
social_issues: Potential backlash from stakeholders and environmental groups
governance_issues: Regulatory investigations into compliance and market conduct
Historical controversies related to corporate governance and ethical practices
